sentences.en: ...a highly autobiographical novel of a woman's search for identity.
sentences.cn: …一部关于一位女性寻找自我、自传性色彩浓厚的长篇小说。

sentences.en: Besides the similar theme, both of the two novels are autobiographical ones.
sentences.cn: 除了主题相似外, 自传体是这两部小说的另一共同之处.

sentences.en: Critics accused him of being rambling , repetitious, sometimes incoherent and lazily autobiographical.
sentences.cn: 评论家指责他文风冗长含糊且反复, 批评他时有的语无伦次和怠惰的自传体风格.

sentences.en: He tends to include many autobiographical characters in his novels.
sentences.cn: 他有意在他的小说中写进许多自传性的人物.

sentences.en: Her book is not without autobiographical meaning.
sentences.cn: 她的书不无为自己作传的意图。

sentences.en: His novels are largely autobiographical, ie though fictional they describe many of his own experiences.
sentences.cn: 他的小说大多是自传式的(即虽属虚构,但却描述许多亲身经历).

sentences.en: In his autobiographical poem'The Prelude ', Wordsworth describes his boyhood in the Lakes.
sentences.cn: 在他的自传体诗《序曲》中,华茲华斯描述了自己在英格兰北部湖区的童年生活.

sentences.en: Meridian can be regarded as an autobiographical novel of Alice Walker.
sentences.cn: 《玛丽迪恩》可视为艾丽丝.渥克的自传小说.

sentences.en: The Bell Jar is an autobiographical novel written by Sylvia Plath.
sentences.cn: 摘要《钟形罩》是普拉斯的自传体小说.

sentences.en: The Blithedale Romance has a more directly autobiographical origin than any of his other novels.
sentences.cn: 《福谷传奇》比他的其他任何一本小说都更具有自传性质的直接描写.

sentences.en: The film is autobiographical and the central character is played by Collard himself.
sentences.cn: 这部电影是自传体，其中的主角由科勒德亲自扮演。

sentences.en: These poems are by no means purely autobiographical.
sentences.cn: 这些诗篇决不纯粹是自传性质的.

sentences.en: This acute sense of alienation finds most vivid expression in London's semi - autobiographical novel MARTIN EDEN.
sentences.cn: 这种尖锐的异化,在伦敦带有一定自传性质的小说《马丁-伊登》中得到了十分生动的反映.

sentences.en: This massive autobiographical work was the logical culmination of her long career.
sentences.cn: 这部自传体的宏篇巨制是她漫长事业生涯的必然成果.

sentences.en: Unlike Lowell's, his poems are neither autobiographical nor confessional.
sentences.cn: 和洛厄尔不同, 他的诗既不是自传性质的,也不是忏悔的.

sentences.en: You'll begin to see the autobiographical odds and ends that are hidden in his work.
sentences.cn: 你将初步了解到他作品中被掩盖了的一些个人经历的遗迹.

words.tran_cn: 自传的；自传体的；自传作家的

trans.tran_en: An autobiographical piece of writing relates to events in the life of the person who has written it
